text.example: If you found this valuable, you can subscribe to the show on spotify or your favorite podcast app.

Yeah. As as much as, um, it's worth celebrating, uh, the first, uh, spacewalk, um, with an all-female team, I think many of us are looking forward to it just being normal. And, um, I think if it signifies anything, it is, uh, to honor the the women who came before us who, um, were skilled and qualified, um, and didn't get the the same opportunities that we have today.

short.example: Speaker 0 discusses the significance of the first all-female spacewalk with an all-female team, stating that it is a tribute to the skilled and qualified women who were denied opportunities in the past.

text.example: And, um, I think if it signifies anything, it is, uh, to honor the the women who came before us who, um, were skilled and qualified, um, and didn't get the the same opportunities that we have today.

200.description: We expect a 200 to determine whether the callback was successfully received

description: Transcribe audio and video using Deepgram's speech-to-text REST API

parameters.description: URL to which we'll make the callback request
parameters.name: callback

parameters.description: HTTP method by which the callback request will be made
parameters.name: callback_method

parameters.description: Arbitrary key-value pairs that are attached to the API response for usage in downstream processing
parameters.name: extra

parameters.description: Recognizes the sentiment throughout a transcript or text
parameters.name: sentiment

parameters.description: Summarize content. For Listen API, supports string version option. For Read API, accepts boolean only.
parameters.name: summarize

parameters.description: Label your requests for the purpose of identification during usage reporting
parameters.name: tag

parameters.description: Detect topics throughout a transcript or text
parameters.name: topics

parameters.description: Custom topics you want the model to detect within your input audio or text if present Submit up to `100`.
parameters.name: custom_topic

parameters.description: Sets how the model will interpret strings submitted to the `custom_topic` param. When `strict`, the model will only return topics submitted using the `custom_topic` param. When `extended`, the model will return its own detected topics in addition to those submitted using the `custom_topic` param
parameters.name: custom_topic_mode

parameters.description: Recognizes speaker intent throughout a transcript or text
parameters.name: intents

parameters.description: Custom intents you want the model to detect within your input audio if present
parameters.name: custom_intent

parameters.description: Sets how the model will interpret intents submitted to the `custom_intent` param. When `strict`, the model will only return intents submitted using the `custom_intent` param. When `extended`, the model will return its own detected intents in the `custom_intent` param.
parameters.name: custom_intent_mode

parameters.description: Identifies and extracts key entities from content in submitted audio
parameters.name: detect_entities

parameters.description: Identifies the dominant language spoken in submitted audio
parameters.name: detect_language

parameters.description: Recognize speaker changes. Each word in the transcript will be assigned a speaker number starting at 0
parameters.name: diarize

parameters.description: Dictation mode for controlling formatting with dictated speech
parameters.name: dictation

parameters.description: Specify the expected encoding of your submitted audio
parameters.name: encoding

parameters.description: Filler Words can help transcribe interruptions in your audio, like "uh" and "um"
parameters.name: filler_words

parameters.description: Key term prompting can boost or suppress specialized terminology and brands. Only compatible with Nova-3
parameters.name: keyterm

parameters.description: Keywords can boost or suppress specialized terminology and brands
parameters.name: keywords

parameters.description: The [BCP-47 language tag](https://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47) that hints at the primary spoken language. Depending on the Model and API endpoint you choose only certain languages are available
parameters.name: language

parameters.description: Spoken measurements will be converted to their corresponding abbreviations
parameters.name: measurements

parameters.description: AI model used to process submitted audio
parameters.name: model

oneOf.description: Our public models available to all accounts
Custom string if you've had a model trained by Deepgram

parameters.description: Transcribe each audio channel independently
parameters.name: multichannel

parameters.description: Numerals converts numbers from written format to numerical format
parameters.name: numerals

parameters.description: Splits audio into paragraphs to improve transcript readability
parameters.name: paragraphs

parameters.description: Profanity Filter looks for recognized profanity and converts it to the nearest recognized non-profane word or removes it from the transcript completely
parameters.name: profanity_filter

parameters.description: Add punctuation and capitalization to the transcript
parameters.name: punctuate

parameters.description: Redaction removes sensitive information from your transcripts
parameters.name: redact

parameters.description: Search for terms or phrases in submitted audio and replaces them
parameters.name: replace

parameters.description: Search for terms or phrases in submitted audio
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Apply formatting to transcript output. When set to true, additional formatting will be applied to transcripts to improve readability
parameters.name: smart_format

parameters.description: Segments speech into meaningful semantic units
parameters.name: utterances

parameters.description: Seconds to wait before detecting a pause between words in submitted audio
parameters.name: utt_split

parameters.description: Version of an AI model to use
parameters.name: version

oneOf.description: Use the latest version of a model
Use a previous version of a model

parameters.description: Opts out requests from the Deepgram Model Improvement Program. Refer to our Docs for pricing impacts before setting this to true. https://dpgr.am/deepgram-mip
parameters.name: mip_opt_out

requestBody.description: Transcribe an audio or video file

oneOf.description: Accepted response for asynchronous transcription requests

request_id.description: Unique identifier for tracking the asynchronous request

200.description: Returns either transcription results, or a request_id when using a callback.

summary: Transcribe and analyze pre-recorded audio and video
